channel.title: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?
channel.description: I have been wondering what it consisted. Can I know? 2001 - 2007, what did it consist. I made this thread in order to express what your guys miss, you can be here and tell us about your share of what *whatever year you choose* - 2007 was.

item.title: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

http://www.runescapepking.com/viewall.php?pageno=1

Read full topic

item.title: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

[quote=“my names luke, post:67, topic:436654”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539370.msg3950623#msg3950623 date=1332258364]

Rs was a dating site back in 2007, you got your members gear went lumbridge home f2p world or f2p varrock slightly north of varrock centre(:. Bitchezzz loved dat membs armour.

saly we must go by the rules of the internet.

[font=arial black]1.guys are guys
2.Girls are guys
3. and Children are FBI agents[/font]

Most of the time rule 2 is right but sometimes it could be wrong, if a girl is acting alll horney then you know it’s a guy.

2 types of gamers
Girl Gamers
Or G.I.R.L gamers
aka

Guys
In
Real
Life

And 90% of the real girls are ugly or mentally unstable >.<
[/quote]

not tru. go 2 dis site-- porn[/quote]

I have to clean my keyboard now… v.v XD

Read full topic

item.title: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Mitko:

Ah when me and my friends saw a lvl 124 at lessers with full dragon I always kept spamming his chat. Personally I think it’s because we’ve all grown out now. The game is just not fun anymore for me even if they brought it back to 2007.

False. If a game stays the same you don’t grow out of it. You go through “phases” where youll play it and then stop on and off forever. But it wasnt the same for me so the phases stopped

Read full topic
item.source: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?

item.title: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

baddy351:

Phaze is right. Pking was “big” but not even as big as it is today. Back then the world revolved around skilling. The people who made the potions etc. used em in PVM. NOT PVP.

Today they use them for PVM > PVP…

Read full topic
item.source: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?

item.title: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:54, topic:436654”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=539370.msg3948328#msg3948328 date=1332084878]

The world revolved around pking…

This is a complete lie. In no way did ‘the world revolve around pking’.

not sure if troll…

Please explain how the world revolved around pking. I’m curious.

lemme explain to you how it worked.

skillers cooked/fished for food, which was traded to pkers (sometimes PvM, but mostly pkers)
skillers mined and made armour and traded to mostly pkers for cash
skillers farmed and made pots and traded to pkers
skillers crafted amulets for pkers and most used mage to enchant them

Basically what I’m saying is Pkers needed skillers for their gear and shit and Skillers need Pkers for their cash.
[/quote]

Are you serious? The supplies provided into the economy by ‘skillers’ did not all go towards pkers. Infact I doubt that even 50% of it went to the player killing community[/quote]

I can’t tell if you’re serious or…

Read full topic
item.source: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?

item.title: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:37, topic:436654”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=539370.msg3948321#msg3948321 date=1332084085]

The world revolved around pking…

This is a complete lie. In no way did ‘the world revolve around pking’.

not sure if troll…

Please explain how the world revolved around pking. I’m curious.
[/quote]

lemme explain to you how it worked.

skillers cooked/fished for food, which was traded to pkers (sometimes PvM, but mostly pkers)
skillers mined and made armour and traded to mostly pkers for cash
skillers farmed and made pots and traded to pkers
skillers crafted amulets for pkers and most used mage to enchant them

Basically what I’m saying is Pkers needed skillers for their gear and shit and Skillers need Pkers for their cash.[/quote]

Are you serious? The supplies provided into the economy by ‘skillers’ did not all go towards pkers. Infact I doubt that even 50% of it went to the player killing community

Read full topic
item.source: What did Runescape in 2007 consist of?
